GAMES.NAME: LEADERSHIP GAME
GAMES.DESCRIPTION: Based on the Japanese fable of Samurai and the 'Temple of Wisdom', the game helps junior and mid level managers to learn leadership principles and apply the same in their daily activities.

GAMES.NAME: IGNITE FORCE
GAMES.DESCRIPTION: Built as a companion app for Salesforce, this game takes data from SFDC and gamifies the whole process with additional game elements for challenges and collaboration.

GAMES.NAME: RENAISSANCE DISCOVERY DOORS
GAMES.DESCRIPTION: A game built for customer engagement for the Renaissance Hotels which is a part of Marriot International.

GAMES.NAME: SAP SAGEVILLE
GAMES.DESCRIPTION: This game helps to learn about different modules of SAP, with customized content as per the requirements of the organization.

GAMES.NAME: MMS GREENVILLE
GAMES.DESCRIPTION: This game is built for tracking and motivating the BPO task-force and gamify the whole process of completing tasks.

GAMES.NAME: SOCIAL RECRUITING ACCELERATOR
GAMES.DESCRIPTION: Social Media is the new playground for recruitment. This tool will analyse the standings of different potential recruits and current employees in their social impact parameters.
